data.title: East Midlands Chamber (Leicestershire)
data.meta_description: Enhancing East Midlands businesses and communities
data.text:
Enhancing East Midlands businesses and communities

East Midlands Chamber connects, supports and champions businesses and communities across Derbyshire, Leicestershire and Nottinghamshire.

We mobilise our collective strength to create sustainable growth, new opportunities and greater prosperity. As the leading independent business representation organisation covering three counties and cities, thousands of businesses put their trust in us every year.

We help businesses to flourish and grow, and to realise their local and global trading ambitions irrespective of size or sector. As the voice of our business communities, we actively lobby for change, local investment and development of the infrastructure that supports the economic activities in our area.

Working alongside businesses, local authorities, academia and government, we know the importance of strategic planning and delivery. We drive our organisation towards a common vision using a set of goals, which reflect the actions and the business communities we support.
